title: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Snow on Lookout Mountain - 2014   36 Photos  These photos are from Lookout Mountain Battlefield. Between 6 and 9 of snow fell at Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park between February 12 and 13, 2014.          Winter in the Park - 2011   3 Photos  Winter photographs from various units of Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park          Photos of Tours and Landscapes at Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park    3 Photos  This gallery focuses on special tours and programs offered by rangers at Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park. It also highlights some of the views and landscapes from around the park.             Monuments   32 Photos  There are 705 commemorative features including monuments, markers, and tablets, spread across the units of the Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park. Veterans began marking the battlefields in 1894 and the last commemorative feature was added in 1976.          Moccasin Bend   2 Photos  Added in 2003, the Moccasin Bend National Archeological District is the newest unit of the Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Miltiary Park.          Historic Photographs   15 Photos  Historic Photographs            Historic Structures   6 Photos  Historic structures within the Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park          Cannon   7 Photos  Cannon located throughout the Chickamagua and Chattanooga National Military Park.
